hero.title: NextecAsia
hero.subtitle: Nextec-RiskLens Platform
hero.description: A comprehensive, enterprise-grade platform for managing penetration testing projects, findings, and reports with advanced security features and multi-tenant architecture

features.title: Why Choose Nextec-RiskLens?
features.subtitle: Transform your security operations with cutting-edge technology and proven expertise

multiTenant.title: Multi-Tenant Architecture
multiTenant.description: Isolated tenant environments with dedicated management controls and complete data separation for enterprise security

engagementManagement.title: Engagement Management
engagementManagement.description: Comprehensive project and sub-project management with risk scoring and vulnerability tracking

aiFindings.title: AI-Powered Findings
aiFindings.description: Multi-provider AI support (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek) for vulnerability analysis and remediation guidance

professionalReporting.title: Professional Reporting
professionalReporting.description: Template-based report creation with rich text editing, PDF export, and compliance-ready documentation

realTimeNotifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
realTimeNotifications.description: WebSocket-powered live notifications, SLA breach monitoring, and comprehensive audit logging

howItWorks.title: How Nextec-RiskLens Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Streamlined workflow from initial assessment to final report delivery

step1.title: Setup & Configure
step1.description: Create tenant, configure users, roles, and set up your organization with multi-tenant isolation

step2.title: Plan & Execute
step2.description: Create engagements, assign teams, and execute security assessments with methodology integration

step3.title: Document & Report
step3.description: Record findings with AI-powered analysis and generate professional, compliance-ready reports

step4.title: Track & Deliver
step4.description: Monitor progress, track remediation, and deliver results to stakeholders with real-time updates

integrations.title: Powerful Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Seamlessly connect with your existing tools and workflows

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your security needs
pricing.freeTrialNote: All plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

contact.title: Get Started Today
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your penetration testing workflow? Contact our team or start your free trial.

contact.tellUsAbout: Tell us about your penetration testing needs...
contact.responseNote: We'll respond within 4 hours during business hours. By submitting, you agree to our privacy policy.
